database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - 3D molecular analysis of skin surface_Volunteer 3-man_Volunteer 4-Woman. MS/MS Data
entry.description: mzXML files of MS/MS data from skin swab samples collected from 2 human subjects. MS/MS data collected from beauty products used by these subjects are also included. Annotation tables that display the body location and coordinates of each sample is provided.
